title: Tech Debt QnA API
description: Developed a Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) FastAPI service that answers technical debt questions from a PDF dataset using Gemini 1.5, while also exposing project-level metrics such as code smells, refactorings, and faults for Apache projects.

title: NL2SQL Spotify Dataset Assistant
description: Built an interactive NL2SQL chatbot that converts natural language queries into SQL using Gemini 1.5 Pro, executes them on BigQuery, and returns contextual answers with short-term conversational memory.

title: Stock Forecasting Data Pipeline
description: Engineered an end-to-end cloud data pipeline that automates daily stock ingestion, transformation, SARIMA-based forecasting, and visualization using Google Cloud, Airflow orchestration, and CI/CD deployment.

title: Presales AI Documentation Chatbot
description: Architected an enterprise-grade RAG-based documentation chatbot enabling role-based access, semantic search, OCR processing, and RAGAS-driven model evaluation for presales and client-facing teams.

title: LLM Log Analyzer & Evaluation Platform
description: Built an AI-powered chatbot evaluation system that analyzes bot-to-user conversations across 18 structured metrics using GPT-4o mini, computes confusion matrices for performance benchmarking, and visualizes results through a full-stack React dashboard.

title: IEEE Form Bot â€“ AI-Powered Paper Auto-Fill & Editing System
description: Developed an AI-driven IEEE-style paper form automation system that extracts key sections (title, authors, abstract, introduction) from uploaded PDFs using PyPDF2 and enables real-time natural language edits through a Gemini-powered LangGraph agent.
